meanings.definition: Combine (two or more things) to form a whole.
meanings.sent1: She integrates different colors to create a beautiful painting.
meanings.sent2: The recipe integrates various ingredients to make a delicious cake.
meanings.sent3: The puzzle integrates pieces to reveal a hidden picture.
meanings.sent4: His music integrates different genres to produce a unique sound.
meanings.sent5: The architect integrates modern and traditional styles in the building design.

meanings.definition: Bring (people or groups with particular characteristics or needs) into equal participation in or membership of a social group or institution.
meanings.sent1: The program integrates students from diverse backgrounds into a unified team.
meanings.sent2: The organization integrates individuals with disabilities into the workforce.
meanings.sent3: The party integrates guests of all ages for a fun celebration.
meanings.sent4: The school integrates new students seamlessly into the existing community.
meanings.sent5: The club integrates members with different interests to foster collaboration.

meanings.definition: Make (something) a whole by bringing all parts together.
meanings.sent1: He integrates the scattered pieces of information to complete the puzzle.
meanings.sent2: The artist integrates separate elements to form a cohesive artwork.
meanings.sent3: The chef integrates various flavors to create a harmonious dish.
meanings.sent4: The team integrates individual skills to achieve a common goal.
meanings.sent5: The writer integrates plot lines to craft a compelling story.
